title: A Feast of flesh, a banquet of bones
description: A mad king...A girl with unspeakable power. Every year a banquet is held to honour the victims of the Minotaur. A creature so hideous and shaming, it is kept imprisoned in the vast catacombs of the palace by Minos, hungry and alone. It can only dream of the garden and the girl...and the secret she holds.
author: Isaac Hobbs
